entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning late in the evening. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
